articles.description: Senate leaders introduced legislation Thursday to remove federal prohibitions on marijuana a half of a century after Congress deemed it illegal. Senate Majority Leader Chuck Schumer has proposed the Cannabis Administration and Opportunity Act that would federally decriminalize weed and allow states to form their marijuana laws without retribution from Washington D.C.
